app_descript:
App Name: Hushed

Package Name: com.hushed.release

Brief:

Hushed provides an enhanced layer of privacy for phone and messaging communication by offering users a second phone number that operates independently from their primary one. This is ideal for various scenarios like classified ads, dating, and international travel, where maintaining personal security and privacy is critical. With Hushed, conversations can remain confidential, and users have the flexibility to dispose of numbers when no longer needed, ensuring complete control over personal communication.

üìå Core Features:

  • Multiple Phone Numbers: Obtain secondary numbers for different purposes, and easily manage them in one app. üì±
  • Full Messaging Capabilities: Send and receive voice, text, and MMS messages from your Hushed number. üì©
  • Local and International Numbers: Choose from over 300 area codes from the US, Canada, and the UK, or opt for international numbers. üåé
  • Customizable Options: Set up personalized voicemails, auto-reply messages, call forwarding, and routing for each number. üîß
  • Cross-Device Accessibility: Use your account across various devices with WiFi or data connection, transforming even tablets into phones. üì≤

üëç Pros:

  • Enhanced Privacy: Keep your primary number secure by using Hushed numbers for classifieds, dating, or other sensitive activities. üîê
  • No Contracts: Enjoy the freedom of no contractual obligations and a hassle-free sign-up process with no verification needed. üÜì
  • Flexible Plans: Choose from prepaid and pay-as-you-go plans, with the option to extend, delete, or top up numbers as required. üí≥
  • Integration Features: Connect with Slack and Dropbox for seamless communication and storage of voicemails and messages. üß©

üëé Cons:

  • Limited Free Trial: While Hushed offers a free trial, the number and functionality might be limited compared to paid versions. ‚è≥
  • No Emergency Services: Hushed numbers cannot be used for 911 emergency services, which may be a limitation for some users. üöë
  • Shortcode Incompatibility: There may be issues with receiving SMS shortcodes or verification texts from certain services. üî¢
  • Auto-Renewal: Users need to be cautious of the subscription auto-renew feature and manage it properly to avoid unexpected charges. üîÑ

üíµ Price:

  • Hushed has both free trial and paid subscriptions with various plans. Prices will depend on the selected plan, with savings available on yearly subscriptions. In-app purchases and renewals are charged through the Google Play account. üõí

Please note that the descriptions provided above are based on the information given and are subject to changes. For the most up-to-date information, features, and pricing, it's advised to check the app directly in the Google Play Store.
